lyrics:
(yo I aint seen you in a minute, 
but I got something to tell Ya listen)

See the thing about you that caught my eye
Is the same thing that makes me change my mind
It's kinda hard to explain
But girl i'll try
You need to sit down this may take a while
See this girl she sorta looks just like u
(you, you, you)
She even smiles just the way u do
(you, you, you)
So innocent she seemed
But I was fooled
I'm reminded when I look at you

(chorus)
You remind me of a girl that I once knew
I see her face whenever i
I look at u
Wouldn't believe all of the things
She put me through
This is why I just can't get with you

Thought that she was the one for me
Till I found out that she was on her creep
Ohhhh she was sexing every one but me
This is why we could never be

(chorus)
You remind me of a girl that I once knew
I see her face whenever i
I look at u
Wouldn't believe all of the things
She put me through
This is why I just can't get with you

I know it's so unfair to you
(it's so unfair)
That I relate her ignorance to u
(wish I knew)
Wish I knew how to seperate the two
(you remind me)
You remind
